first_para: Thomas Anthony Brake, known as Tom Brake, (born 6 May 1962) is a British, Liberal Democrat politician.

full.extract:
Thomas Anthony Brake, known as Tom Brake, (born 6 May 1962) is a British, Liberal Democrat politician.
He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Carshalton and Wallington. Brake is currently the Liberal Democrat candidate for Carshalton and Wallington for the United Kingdom general election, 2015.
full.title: Tom Brake
